title: Mi-24 Hind: Sound System + Flight Model
description: The Mi-24 Hind Sound System is an easily customizable flight model and about 80 sounds, including engine, rotors and weapon effects for cockpit, exterior and distant views with implemented replication. Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooters.
longDescription:
VIDEO PREVIEW | HOW TO USE VIDEO

The Mi-24 Hind: Sound System + Flight Model – a plugin, сoded in C++ with blueprint integration for the Unreal Engine platform. It offers a seamless fusion of immersive flight simulation and dynamic audio engineering.


  • Easily customizable helicopter flight model
  • The most realistic engine sounds
  • Different sounds from different RPMs, speed, yaw and other helicopter's parameters
  • Weapon sounds from the weapons used by this helicopter in real life
  • Different sounds for cockpit, exterior, and distant views
  • Startup and Shutdown sounds
  • Cockpit sounds
  • Multiplayer Replication for movement and sounds
  • Ideal for AAA multiplayer shooter games


At its core lies a flight model with easily adjustable parameters. However, what truly sets this product apart is its groundbreaking sound system. Featuring approximately 80 dynamically controlled sounds, including the rumble of its engines, rotor whirrs, and the thunderous roar of its weapons systems. The helicopter's soundscape dynamically evolves in response to key flight model parameters, such as engine RPM, yaw, rotor RPM, tail rotor RPM, velocity, and more.


Moreover, the armament is not merely represented – it's brought to life. The thunderous roar of the fixed twin-barrel GSh-30K autocannon is faithfully reproduced in both its high (2600 RPM) and low firing modes (300 RPM). Additionally, the plugin delivers an authentic auditory experience of rocket salvos.


Whether viewed from the exterior, at a distance, or from within the cockpit, distinct sets of audio assets for the helicopter and its weaponry ensure unparalleled realism from every perspective.


Every aspect of the helicopter and its armament's sound design has been crafted to mirror reality. Leveraging our extensive expertise, we have incorporated our own audio recordings to ensure a truly immersive experience.


And for those looking to take their multiplayer projects to the next level, our plugin seamlessly integrates sound and flight model replication. So whether you're embarking on a solo mission or engaging in adrenaline-pumping multiplayer battles, the "Mi-24 Hind: Sound System + Flight Model" plugin ensures an electrifying experience every time.
technicalDetails:
Code Module: MI24_SoundSystem (Runtime Module)

Number of Blueprints: 7

Number of C++ Classes: 7

Network Replicated: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: Windows

Supported Target Build Platforms: Windows


MI-24 HIND HELICOPTER SOUND SYSTEM DEMONSTRATION: VIDEO

HOW TO USE IT WITH OUR READY-MADE SCENE AND FLIGHT MODEL: VIDEO

  • Enable "MI24_SoundSystem " from Installed and "Windows RawInput" from Built-In plugins from "Edit > Plugins".
  • Set up the audio settings of your project as described in the 'How to Use' video.
  • Restart UE5.
  • Open "DemoLevel" from the plugin content folder.
  • FLY!!!


Check MI24_FlightModel_BP and MI24_SFX_Component_BP Actor Components in the MI24_Helicopter_BP to adjust Flight Model and Sound settings.


You can find all plugin content in Content Browser. Make sure the checkboxes Bottom right of the "Content Browser > View Options > Show Engine Content" and "Content Browser > View Options > Show Plugin Content" are checked.
